[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@3rdweb/sdk](./sdk.md) &gt; [ISplitsModule](./sdk.isplitsmodule.md)

## ISplitsModule interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ISplitsModule 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [balanceOf(address)](./sdk.isplitsmodule.balanceof.md) | Returns the amount of royalty available for a recipient to withdraw in the native currency. |
|  [balanceOfToken(walletAddress, tokenAddress)](./sdk.isplitsmodule.balanceoftoken.md) | Returns the amount of royalty available for a recipient to withdraw in the native currency in a specific currency. |
|  [distribute()](./sdk.isplitsmodule.distribute.md) | Distributes all funds to the recipients. |
|  [distributeToken(tokenAddress)](./sdk.isplitsmodule.distributetoken.md) | Distributes all funds to the recipients in the specified currency. |
|  [getAllRecipients()](./sdk.isplitsmodule.getallrecipients.md) | Returns a list of all recipients with their respective split percentages. |
|  [getRecipientSplitPercentage(address)](./sdk.isplitsmodule.getrecipientsplitpercentage.md) | Get the split percentage of a recipient. |
|  [withdraw(address)](./sdk.isplitsmodule.withdraw.md) | Transaction that will withdraw the split amount of royalty that the <code>address</code> is owed and transfer it to the wallet. |
|  [withdrawToken(walletAddress, tokenAddress)](./sdk.isplitsmodule.withdrawtoken.md) | Transaction that will withdraw the split amount of royalty that the <code>address</code> is owed and transfer it to the wallet, in the currency specified by <code>tokenAddress</code>.<!-- -->For example: If the native currency of a chain is ETH but the user wants to withdraw their split in $MATIC, they should pass the address of the $MATIC token as the <code>tokenAddress</code> parameter. |
